@tobasjas hiding feeling trope is common in ntr but that's about it. 
Girl along the way also develop feeling for sensei, you see that when she keeps asking if he loves her, have feeling from her time after time. Even after the fucked up shit she did to CF she goes to ask sensei feeling for her possibility to fill the guilt and void from CF. In rough context she is basically a naive person turn into hoe drunk on sensei dick, completely under sensei thumb, let go to rejoin her CF who had crush on her and apparently her too which was vaguely mention anywhere. Wholesome ending? yes Retarded plot? Definitely

@godaries my personal understanding is that they both have feelings for each other it's just that cause their not in the same class the guy doesn't know she's getting bullied in comes temp teach who easily seduces her into spreading her legs then teach convinces her to go out with the guy, since he somehow knows the guy is about to confess and he tells her to accept it, then after that part is done and she's discovered she feels bad about it but can't really understand why but the teach sort of tells her what it's about but seemingly dumb she just follows what he tells her. In this case the teach himself understands he's just using her for sexual relief and admits it and since he's leaving he decides to help the two out. Still the ending makes me wonder about the braincells of the pair since they clearly got used by the teach but still see him as someone good since they became closer.

Okay quick summary, girl labeled muscle brain, childhood friend has a crush but doesn't come clean and poorly word his hints of affection. Girl already in sexual relationship with sensei and has feeling for the dude 'cause he is the only one who see her womanly charm. But to sensei she's only a sexual outlet, he knows that and admits it. Sensei ask girl to fake confess her CF for the kink and spicing his relationship up. She does. Onto her seducing/fooling the poor pure hearted Fool and having sex with CF. Sensei calls to fuck again, she does. Sharing the story of her fake confession and sex with CF while they fuck. CF finds out. Heart broken. Girl stop talking to CF, viceversa. Onto her talkin to sensei about how she wants to quit the sports team 'cause she a little guilty of playing with CF feeling and can't look at him anymore(no shit bitch). Sensei said strip, she strip and sex time.

Girl asks sensei if he loves her romantically to which sensei says he only see her as beautiful women worth fucking and he will not be a good match for her. They continue to fuck. Onto Sensei offering Ex-CF to have sex with the girl again. CF agrees. Onto sex with CF, girl finds out she had sex with CF again and ask sensei why did this? Sensei answers to her that he's quitting his job after this one last smash and wants her to be together with CF 'cause he himself don't deserve her. Final threesome. Sensei out, friendship with CF recovered. Girl didn't quit the team. Implied they both going out now. ............................... PERSONAL OPINION: Ugly bastard wasn't so ugly in the end(still a bastard). Color me surprised. Girl is naive. Still hate the hoe who didn't even had any feelings for childhood friend (until all of a sudden she does now) doing what she did to him on sensei's request. Dumb Bitch is a bitch through and through. Would've fucked anyone if sensei ordered.
